intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What is your favorite winter activity?
What is your favorite breakfast cereal?
Where do you want to travel?

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to drink?
respond_situations.description: You are at a café. You need to choose a drink.

respond_situations.starter_line: Where do you want to go?
respond_situations.description: You are at a bus stop.
You are in a clothing shop. You want to know the price.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask a friend for help with homework.
You are shopping. Ask the shopkeeper for the price of a shirt.
You want to ask your friend about a subject. ..

listening_script.text: I make a lunch box. I put rice in it. I add some chicken. I include an apple. I close the box tightly.

questions.question: What do I put in it?
When do I close the box?
Why do I make a lunch box?

follow_up_questions.question: Where do you keep your toys?
When do you play with your toys?
How do you take care of your toys?
